title: hESC-beta and diabetes human insulin in mice 1

content.question: Which of the following modifications to the experimental design would improve the reliability of the results presented in Figure 1 ?

choices.label: Measuring blood glucose levels in human patients who have type 1 diabetes
Measuring blood glucose levels in a group of mice that were not given STZ
Using a drug that destroys both mouse β-cells and hESC-β cells
Injecting the mice in the experiment with sucrose or fructose

content.answer: Measuring blood glucose levels in a group of mice that were not given STZ

skill.text: 3.D: Propose a new investigation based on an evaluation of the experimental design or evidence.
